text: Pearson plc is a British multinational publishing and education company. They are headquartered in London. It was created as a construction business in the 1840s, but they changed to publishing in the 1920s.Spender, J. A., Weetman Pearson: First Viscount Cowdray (London: Cassell and Company Limited, 1930). It is the biggest education company, and it was once the largest book publisher in the world. ==References== ==Other websites== * Pearson plc Official website * * List of Pearson-owned companies from the Columbia Journalism Review Category:Publishing companies of the United Kingdom
